data.text: @Tapan19487425 We understand your concern sir. It can be very disappointing. Please know that we always advise our passengers to carry their valuables in their hand baggage, please visit https://t.co/qb9oePcEt7 for further information.

@SumaSriharsha Hi, we regret the experience. Our aircraft undergo deep cleaning on a daily basis and we have defined processes to ensure the same. Further, please DM us your PNR so, we may share it with our concerned team right away.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@LaxmanS67457180 We understand where you are coming from. We regret the hassle caused to you. Please know we will not be able to provide you with delayed compensation. However, we have noted have concern for review. We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Pre-Book Excess Baggage: Domestic & International - IndiGo
urls.description: Book pre-paid excess baggage upto 2 hours prior to the scheduled departure of your flight. Checkout extra baggage slabs/ charges at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @binaymallick Hi, we regret the late response. Please visit https://t.co/wZygsNMdrC for more information.~ Nandita

@Thewatcher9992 Hello, we regret the delayed response. Could you please share email id from which the booking was made along with the case reference number via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@mohmaaya Hi, we try our best to keep our customers informed of any anticipated schedule change well before time so customers can prepare themselves accordingly. However, please know given the nature of our operation unanticipated schedule changes can occur at any point in time. ~Linda
@mohitb113 Mr Bhatia, we believe our team has called to address your concern in this regard. ~Linda

@akhilesh_kmu Sir, we regret the delay. It is never our intention to disrupt customers' travel plans. We always try our best to maintain our inflight schedule. As checked, the delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. We see the flight is airborne now.~ Nandita

@San_sin19 Hello, we regret the delayed response. As checked, you may carry earther pot and pan in the cabin bags. Thank you. ~Diyashi

@PariweshP baggage sorting area, baggage belt, baggage trolley & aircraft baggage hold. We will share your feedback with the baggage handling team to be more careful. We hope to give you a better experience the next time you choose to fly with us. ~Linda (2/2)

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @jaankrish0210 Sir, we regret the trouble. Sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. You may visit https://t.co/6643rYe4I7 to opt for plan B and change the time and/or date of your flight or cancel and process a refund.~ Nandita

@gurumurthi79 Sir, we regret the discomforting ride. We have already shared your feedback with the concerned team. Also, you may always get in touch with our crew to adjust the cabin temperature. ~Snigdha

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @RiazLamak Sir, the necessary refund has been processed from our end. Please visit https://t.co/ZFvpp2lDUJ to check the real-time status of your refund and reach out to the concerned bank for more information in this regard. ~Prahlad

@ashu4ubest Hi, we didn't mean to ruin your trip. Please be informed, check-in counter closes 60 mins & boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to departure. (1/2)

data.text: @IamVeeroo Sir, we always want to ensure the check-in baggage of passengers arrives in a safe condition. However, minor wear and tear may occur during the loading and offloading of the bag. You may visit https://t.co/pjhBz6Eze2 Clause 17.3 for detailed information on this. Thanks. ~Navi
